newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo JGB market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo JGB market closed for holiday.

text.p: The Tokyo Japanese government bond and futures market is closed on Thursday for a national holiday.
The market will reopen on Friday.
On Wednesday, the yield of the key 182nd 10-year JGB closed at 2.260 percent, down 0.025 from Tuesday's close.

The key June 10-year JGB futures contract closed up 0.16 at 126.11 after it was underpinned by late cash bond buying from investors aiming to keep JGB holdings at their book closings. The June moved between 125.60 and 126.20 with 60,198 contracts changing hands.-- Tokyo Treasury Desk +81-33432-8570
